posts.post_content:
Im thinking of letting go of this near complete Series 4 set. Looking to move as a lot only. This set is very comparable in overall condition to the one just sold in REA. Actually about a half grade better assuming the raw set was graded accurately [url]http://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bidplace.aspx?itemid=33823[/url]

With the benefit of already having 41 of the 45 cards SGC graded. The breakdown is

SGC 30+=29 cards with 18 above SGC 40
SGC 20 and under=12 cards none trimmed

[url]http://www.sgccard.com/usersetcomposition.aspx?id=0&usersetid=6945[/url]

Raw Cards

Brumfield F
Cochrane F
Mollenkamp VG
Moye F

This set needs only Aylor, Benny, Canepa, and Dougherty for completion. 


Ill start with offers for the set from interested parties. I do have a price in mind. I will entertain trades/partial trades as well. Please message me to discuss further. Thank you
Wow!!!!  From someone who has been chasing this series for a while now, that is a VERY impressive group of cards.  Good luck with the sale
